summary:
Finance professional holder of 9+ years of work experience at commercial management level and business partner and 4+ years at Finance and Accounting roles, leveraged by a Master in Finance from the National College of Ireland, with expertise and exposure to financial evaluation, reporting, and analysis, seeking a challenging role in strategic roles such as Finance Analyst and Accounting/Business controlling roles.

With track work at industries such as: Retail, Manufacturing, Food, Hospitality, Gaming, Online Marketing and NGO who have built experience in driving strategic initiatives, design cost structure and control,  modelling cash flow to support business growth and optimize financial performance through Key Performance Objectives (KPO's) . 

Proven ability to provide strategic insights, build strong relationships, and drive cross-functional collaboration, delivering results in fast-paced environments. Holder of analytical skills and ability to provide actionable insights for strategic planning and process improvement.

Proven track record, but not limited in:

Financial Analysis & Reporting
Budgeting & Forecasting
Business Performance Management
Cost Control & Profitability Analysis
Strategic Planning & Decision Support
Financial Modeling & Evaluation
Variance Analysis & KPI Monitoring
Process Improvement & Optimization
Team management skills

certifications.name: Fundamentals of Data Analysis in Excel
The Role of the FP&A Professional

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for full cycle of accounts receivable globally for two commodities, overseeing revenue of over €15 million.
•	Conduct bi-monthly accounting audits to ensure system reconciliations.
•	Consolidate data supported by tools such as Excel and NetSuite to issue accurate invoices and reports.
•	Active key liaison between company departments and customers regarding disputes and queries.
•	Developed strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, fostering collaboration and effective communication.
•	Developed strategies for successful debt and cash collection with result in decrees of 20% in past overdue and visibility for a bad debts .
•	Prepared clearance and reporting on accounts receivable status, including overdue classification and team collection analysis.
•	Actively participated in monthly closings and contributed to the creation of a Power BI dashboard for strategic decision-making.
profile_positions.title: Accountant AR - Markets

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed the full cycle of accounts receivable for the European region, overseeing more than €30 million in revenue.
•	Conducted daily finance audits to identify potential overbudgets to ensure financial compliance and implement corrective actions.
•       Investigate, track and become a key lesson between BU management and Finance in order to conduct strategies to prevent the overbudgeting. 
•	Consolidated data from finished projects to issue accurate invoices and reports using various tools and several databases, including Excel query and Acumatica Accounting software.
•	Fostered synergies and strategic flow of information within a complex matrix of stakeholders.
•	Collaborated with internal departments to address financial issues and maintain project financial health.
•	Played an active role in the monthly closing process, including analysing project performance and advising on credit memos and invoice reversals.
•	Assisted in various finance operations, including accounts payable, treasury, and ad-hoc financial analysis.
profile_positions.title: Finance Project Administrator

profile_positions.description:
•	Designed and implemented chart of accounts, ensuring accurate financial reporting.
•	Provide financial advisory services, including bank reconciliation, financial reporting, P&L and cash flow management, and AP/AR administration.
•	Analyse pricing strategies and provide commercial strategies advisory.
•	Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients and suppliers.
•	Construct API connections between accounting systems and banks to streamline data flow.
•	Prepare weekly, monthly, and quarterly financial reports including profit and loss statements and cash flow management to support decision-making.
profile_positions.title: Financial Advisor

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed daily finance operations, including transaction verification, allocation, and reconciliation for general ledger processes.
•	Oversaw accounts payable and accounts receivable using Billoid and factuursturen systems, ensuring accurate financial reporting.
•	Developed cash flow projections and managed treasury procedures, handling payments up to €100k per month.
•	Maintained customer relationship management and supplier relationship management.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to provide proactive support in areas such as pricing analysis, data analytics, budgeting, and KPI construction.
•	Strengthened external and internal stakeholder relationships to drive business growth.
•	Proactive assistance with the commercial area with ad-hoc task such as price analyst, data analyst, budgeting and KPIs construction
profile_positions.title: Finance Accountant

profile_positions.description: Leading, coordinating, training and developing a team of 10 people. Reporting on cost and sales and identifying efficiency processes to increase profit (advising and controlling OPEX) . Thriving for continuous improvement in customer service, aiming at best practices and achieving efficiency and effectiveness (increasing the assets profit CAPEX) . Backoffice duties such as controlling invoices, data entry in the system, tracking deliveries, ensuring respect of storage procedures. 10% sales increase and constantly exceeding profit targets.
profile_positions.title: Store Manager

profile_positions.description:
Working part time while I was pursuing my master degree. Outstanding Irish environment in which I could have developed capabilities and skills, sharing and increasing my professional career with co-workers and management along 2+ years. 
Oversight 5 work sections, leading and supervising a team work of 10 people, looking for excellence in customer service, efficiency and effective working. Making the processes efficient hence increasing the outlook to the customers either the profits to the stack holders.
profile_positions.title: Deli supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Duties / Responsibilities 
	Team leader, rotation over different areas at the store
	Customer service
	Looking after the deliveries (correct storage and tracking control)
	HACCP control and tracking
	Setting minimum and maximum stock, looking after the correct rotation


Key Achievements
	Rotating over the different sections of the store, due to my active disposition to learn. 
	Managing a team of 4 – 5 people as Supervisory, looking after efficiency, doing the task in the less time possible and always providing the best customer service.
	Thriving for continuous improvement in process, having as a goal the best practices and achieving the efficiency and effectiveness.
	Administrative duties such as controlling invoices, tracking deliveries, ensuring respect of stored procedures, filling and updating HACCP forms.
profile_positions.title: Deli assistant

profile_positions.description: The Chopped Company is growing as a franchise in Dublin, being on this, it is important that all the processes, procedures and standards on  which Chopped as a brand has and works on it should be followed. I am in charge to make sure that those processes are  implemented and followed as the directrices from the company.
profile_positions.title: Training team

profile_positions.description:
Duties / Responsibilities
•	In charge of 4 people
•	Looking for the excellence in customer service
•	Dealing with suppliers
•	Continuous tracking of deliveries, correct storage and waste
•	Treasury and cash hand managing 
•	Administrative duties

Key Achievements
	Managing a team of 4 people as Supervisor and Assistant Manager, looking after efficiency, doing the task in the less time possible and always providing the best customer service.
	Thriving for continuous improvement in process, having as a goal the best practices and achieving the efficiency and effectiveness.
	Administrative duties such as controlling invoices, tracking deliveries, ensuring respect of storage procedures, filling and updating HACCP forms.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Assessed the financial status of members by creating financial models and conducting credit analysis. Kept the services portfolio up-to-date to meet the ongoing demand of potential clients. Maintained the reliability and accuracy of financial transactions and reporting through quality control. Monitored customer service desk operations to accommodate customer/end user with information and support related to products/services.
Key Contributions:
▪	Increased productivity at workplace by initiating and driving productive projects also gauged performance over the different companies belonging to the account
▪	Advising and giving constructive recommendation to the credit department about setting credit limits regarding loans up to €20,000 based on personalized financial modelling
▪	Achieved accuracy in preparation of financial statement by advising management and ensuring strict adherence with standard processes and procedures
▪	Provided excellent customer experience with the mitigation of issues resolution time by forwarding/communicating all client concerns to related department as a liaison
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

volunteer_experiences.description:
COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT
2015‐ 2019: Colombian Independence Day celebration, Dublin, - Ireland 
Drove all key affairs of an organisation in the celebration of the Colombian Independence for 4 years, addressed to 300+ people. Lead a logistics group while devising plans and executing logistic, accountancy, public relationship, marketing, and budgeting functions.
